author: Anonymous Comp
title: TA's Email?
question: Hi, I'm not sure if I am allowed this, but I misplaced my TA's email and need to send her my lab before midnight tonight. Her name is Jessica Ha. Does anyone happen to have her email? Thanks!
student_answer: Why do u need to mail her u just need to spd handin to submit the lab
instructor_answer: There is no reason to contact your TAs directly and we do not provide students with their contact information.
